SQLFunctionSpec.Name: Convert Text to Boolean
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Converts text entry to boolean bit
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Bill Elfstrom
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CONVERTTEXTTOBOOLEAN(@TEXTTOCONVERT as nvarchar(5)) returns bit with execute as caller as begin -- do work here and return a value
declare @WORK_TEXT as nvarchar(5) declare @BIT_OUT as bit = null
set @WORK_TEXT = upper(@TEXTTOCONVERT)
if @WORK_TEXT = 'TRUE' or @WORK_TEXT = 'YES' or @WORK_TEXT = '1' set @BIT_OUT = 1 else if @WORK_TEXT = 'FALSE' or @WORK_TEXT = 'NO' or @WORK_TEXT = '0' set @BIT_OUT = 0 else set @BIT_OUT = null
return @BIT_OUT end
